entry.summary:

There is still time left to tell @POKTnetwork what open-source libraries web3 is missing! 🤔 Do you have a long-standing problem, or just a good idea? Let them know and you got the chance to win $100 worth of POKT tokens! 💸 #30daysoftext
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): #30daysoftext Day 6 Another one for our partners, this time with a bounty! 🤑 What open-source libraries would you like @POKTnetwork to build? 🏗 The winner gets 100 USD worth of POKT tokens 💸 Make sure to tag @POKTnetwork, so they can find it 🤫

entry.title: Re @Jamiescript thinks the web3 ecosystem needs better identity management solutions. Do you think that's the case or are there more pressing issues t...
entry.summary:
Re @Jamiescript thinks the web3 ecosystem needs better identity management solutions. Do you think that's the case or are there more pressing issues that @POKTnetwork could solve with an open-source library?
Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Day 6 @POKTnetwork should consider building and open-sourcing a Decentralized Identity Management System (DIMS) built upon Pokt's robust infrastructure. It's like OAuth but for Web3 and completely decentralized.

entry.title: Re @CuriousRabeet seems concerned about security in the ecosystem and wishes for a security audit toolkit. What do you think? #30daysoftext
entry.summary:
Re @CuriousRabeet seems concerned about security in the ecosystem and wishes for a security audit toolkit. What do you think? #30daysoftext
Syed Rabeet: #30daysoftext Day 6 @developer_dao I would like @POKTnetwork to build an open-source security audit toolkit related to smart contracts and applications. This toolkit can include best practices and guidelines to ensure the security of the applications built on the network.
